metadata.Title: CVE-2020-5254 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In NetHack before 3.6.6, some out-of-bound values for the hilite_status option can be exploited. NetHack 3.6.6 resolves this issue.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-5254` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nethack-common - 3.6.6-1
nethack-console - 3.6.6-1
nethack-qt - 3.6.6-1
nethack-x11 - 3.6.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nethack package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.6-1').
